function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Proxy for the period prevalence of covid-19 in the cities served by the wwtp","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Recovery efficiency of f-specific rna phages in purification and concentration steps","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Presence of sars-cov-2 in sewage and potential for health risks to workers","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increas in virus load in sewer systems due to circulation of the virus in the population","category":"Water","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited data duration less than four months in the selected studies","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Cold air causing vasoconstriction of the respiratory tract and weakening of the immune system","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dry cold air making the nasal mucosa prone to small ruptures, creating opportunities for virus invasion","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low or extremely cold temperature playing a positive role in reducing the transmission of coronavirus","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of covid-19 in tropical climates due to heat intolerance of the virus and breakdown of lipid bilayer","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Seasonality and environmental influences on the spread of respiratory pathogens","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased viral stability and reproduction in cold temperatures","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Suitable temperature and humidity range for the survival and transmission of covid-19","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of characterization of exact local temperature and humidity conditions","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Coronavirus can retain infectivity in low temperature and low humidity environment for up to 2 weeks","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High transmissibility of sars-cov-2","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unclear routes of virus transmission","category":"Air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fragility of paper signs reflecting uncertainty during pandemic","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited supply of professional signs due to demand and production capacity","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of small and sans-serif fonts on informal signs","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited color options due to cost and availability of printers","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of paper signage in retail stores may deteriorate quickly due to weather conditions, reducing the effectiveness of communication and hygiene messaging.","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Duct tape used for marking direction of travel and indicating where to stand","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Longevity of professional signs","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of replacement signs for covid-19 measures communication","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Informal signs printed on paper with regular tape may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases if not properly handled or disposed.","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of traditional paper signs for covid-related information limits the ability to dynamically update and adapt messaging in real-time.","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Photographing signs related to covid-19 inside retail establishments may increase the risk of exposure to the virus for the person taking the photographs.","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Extensive use of paper signs for conveying covid-19 information","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Messaging on caloric count and food choices in restaurants","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Crowded places and non-essential gatherings","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor internet infrastructure and slow internet speed impeding the full realization of virtual reality technology.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improperly adjusted head-mounted virtual reality devices causing blurry images and text","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Securing electronic medical records using blockchain","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integrating point-of-care diagnostics for self-testing of covid-19 patients in isolation","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Heterogeneous network protocols and smart applications in remote consultation could lead to privacy and security vulnerabilities.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid diagnosis of covid-19 patients lack of quality test","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Malicious attack of iomt healthcare equipment","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of personal identification with safety systems could breach privacy and security of health systems.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Remote collection of covid-19 pandemic data using blockchain records could pose privacy risks.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges of implementing blockchain technology in health systems could lead to security vulnerabilities.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High-risk patients identification","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited information on how covid-19 spreads in asymptomatic individuals","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of covid-19 testing kits and detection tools","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Worsening of psychophysical conditions due to pandemic-induced restrictions","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Difficulty in performing intense exercise at home compared to moderate activity","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited sample size for the study","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of privacy and data security for participants due to online questionnaire administration.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate sensitivity and specificity of biosensors for covid-19 detection","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of rapid and multiplexity in diagnostic tools for covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of cyber-security and privacy in tracking apps and wastewater surveillance","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"High"}]}
